bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of luo li 瘰癧 , scrofula with pervasion-illness, developing in the armpits or groin. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wu ming yi 無名異 quotes Duo neng bi shi Book on agriculture. Ming era. 多能鄙事 : 股陰 麌 癧：無名異二 錢，麝香一字，研。酒半碗，午後空腹服，立效 , “For scrofula with pervasion-illness in the groin: wu ming yi , 2 qian ; she xiang , the amount covering 1 character [on a copper coin]. Grind and mix with half a bowl of wine. Ingest after noon on an empty abdomen. Immediately effective”.
